verses.verse: And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> that the <S%H4945>butler<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and his <S%H644>baker<s%> had <S%H2398>offended<s%> their <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> was <S%H7107>wroth<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> of his <S%H5631>officers,<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H4945>butlers,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H644>bakers.<s%>

And he <S%H5414>put<s%> them in <S%H4929>ward<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard,<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H1004>prison,<s%> <S%H5470><s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was <S%H631>bound.<s%>

And the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> <S%H6485>charged<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them, and he <S%H8334>served<s%> them: and they <S%H1961>continued<s%> a <S%H3117>season<s%> in <S%H4929>ward.<s%>

And they <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them, each <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H2472>dream<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> each <S%H376>man<s%> according to the <S%H6623>interpretation<s%> of his <S%H2472>dream,<s%> the <S%H4945>butler<s%> and the <S%H644>baker<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H631>bound<s%> in the <S%H1004>prison.<s%> <S%H5470><s%>
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and looked <S%H7200>upon<s%> them, and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they were <S%H2196>sad.<s%>

And he <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H5631>officers<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H854>with<s%> him in the <S%H4929>ward<s%> of his <S%H113>lord's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4069>Wherefore<s%> <S%H6440>look<s%> ye so <S%H7451>sadly<s%> <S%H3117>today?<s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, We have <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H6622>interpreter<s%> of it. And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, Do <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6623>interpretations<s%> belong to <S%H430>God?<s%> <S%H5608>tell<s%> me them, I pray <S%H4994>you.<s%>

And the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H4945>butler<s%> <S%H5608>told<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H2472>dream<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, In my <S%H2472>dream,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H1612>vine<s%> was <S%H6440>before<s%> me;

And in the <S%H1612>vine<s%> were <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8299>branches:<s%> and it was as though it <S%H6524>budded,<s%> and <S%H1931>her<s%> <S%H5322>blossoms<s%> shot <S%H5927>forth;<s%> and the <S%H811>clusters<s%> thereof brought <S%H1310>forth<s%> ripe grapes: <S%H6025><s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3563>cup<s%> was in my <S%H3027>hand:<s%> and I <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6025>grapes,<s%> and <S%H7818>pressed<s%> them <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3563>cup,<s%> and I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3709>hand.<s%>
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H6623>interpretation<s%> of it: The <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8299>branches<s%> are <S%H7969>three<s%> days: <S%H3117><s%>

Yet <S%H5750><s%> within <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> lift <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> thine <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H7725>restore<s%> thee <S%H5921>unto<s%> thy <S%H3653>place:<s%> and thou shalt <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3563>cup<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> after the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H4941>manner<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> thou <S%H1961>wast<s%> his <S%H4945>butler.<s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> think <S%H2142>on<s%> me <S%H834>when<s%> it shall be <S%H3190>well<s%> with thee, and <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H5973>unto<s%> me, and make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of me <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and bring me <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> house: <S%H1004><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> indeed I was stolen <S%H1589>away<s%> <S%H1589><s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews:<s%> and <S%H6311>here<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> have I <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H3972><s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> they should <S%H7760>put<s%> me into the <S%H953>dungeon.<s%>

When the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H644>baker<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H6622>interpretation<s%> was <S%H2896>good,<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> was in my <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I had <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2751>white<s%> <S%H5536>baskets<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> my head: <S%H7218><s%>

And in the <S%H5945>uppermost<s%> <S%H5536>basket<s%> there was of all <S%H4480>manner<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of <S%H3978>bakedmeats<s%> <S%H4639><s%> <S%H644><s%> for <S%H6547>Pharaoh;<s%> and the <S%H5775>birds<s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%> them out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H5536>basket<s%> <S%H4480>upon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> my <S%H7218>head.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H6623>interpretation<s%> thereof: The <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5536>baskets<s%> are <S%H7969>three<s%> days: <S%H3117><s%>

Yet <S%H5750><s%> within <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> lift <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H7218>head<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee, and shall <S%H8518>hang<s%> thee <S%H5921>on<s%> a <S%H6086>tree;<s%> and the <S%H5775>birds<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1320>flesh<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee.

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> which <S%H853>was<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3117>birthday,<s%> <S%H3205><s%> that he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4960>feast<s%> unto <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5650>servants:<s%> and he lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H4945>butler<s%> and of the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H644>baker<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

And he <S%H7725>restored<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H4945>butler<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> his <S%H4945>butlership<s%> again; and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> hand: <S%H3709><s%>
But he <S%H8518>hanged<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H644>baker:<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> had <S%H6622>interpreted<s%> to them.
Yet did <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H4945>butler<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> but <S%H7911>forgot<s%> him.
